page.title: 17WARBOYS VILLAGE SURVEY
page.content: We decided to find out more about the people in Warboys by asking them some questions. Altogether we interviewed {429}people.{399}lived in Warboys and{ {30}did not. We found that about{36%}had lived in Warboys for over 25 years,{13%}for 10-25 years,{29%}for 5-10 years and {15%}for less than 5 years. Most people questioned said that the new Warboys by-pass had not affected them - only about{10%}said that it had. {20%}said that they used the bus service regularly,{12%}said sometimes, and {68%}never used the bus service. {80%}of the people felt that the village needed a pedestrian crossing. The shops in the village were used regularly by{57%. 29%}only used them for things they had forgotten and{14%} said that they never used the shops.
